name: scandit-sdk

scripts.build: yarn build:main && yarn replace-version build/main/lib/workers/engineSDKWorker.js && yarn build:module && yarn replace-version build/module/lib/workers/engineSDKWorker.js && rm -rf build/browser && yarn build:browser-umd && yarn build:browser-esm
scripts.build:browser-esm: rollup -c config/exports/rollup.config.js -f es -o build/browser/index.esm.js && yarn prettier --write build/browser/index.esm.js && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c config/exports/rollup.config.js -f es -o build/browser/index.esm.min.js && yarn replace-version build/browser/index.esm.js build/browser/index.esm.min.js
scripts.build:browser-umd: rollup -c config/exports/rollup.config.js -f umd --name ScanditSDK -o build/browser/index.js && yarn prettier --write build/browser/index.js && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c config/exports/rollup.config.js -f umd --name ScanditSDK -o build/browser/index.min.js && yarn replace-version build/browser/index.js build/browser/index.min.js
scripts.build:main: rm -rf build/main && mkdir -p build/main/styles && \cp -r src/styles/* build/main/styles && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:module: rm -rf build/module && mkdir -p build/module/styles && \cp -r src/styles/* build/module/styles && tsc -p config/exports/tsconfig.module.json
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/main && rm -rf build/module && rm -rf build/browser && rm -rf test
scripts.copy-special-docs: mkdir -p docs && { echo "<style>body{font-family:Sans-Serif;}</style>" & marked CHANGELOG.md; } > docs/CHANGELOG.html && mv -f docs/CHANGELOG.html docs/CHANGELOG.md && \cp LICENSE docs/LICENSE
scripts.coverage: yarn unit && yarn html-coverage && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.docs:html: rm -rf docs && typedoc --name "Scandit Barcode Scanner SDK for the Web" src --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --exclude "**/*.spec.ts" --target es6 --mode file --theme typedoc-custom-theme --out docs && yarn copy-special-docs
scripts.docs:json: typedoc --name "Scandit Barcode Scanner SDK for the Web" --target es6 --mode file --json docs/typedoc.json src/index.ts
scripts.license: echo-cli Copyright © 2018 Scandit AG. All Rights Reserved.\\n\\nThe use of this software is governed by the Scandit Terms and Conditions.\\nhttps://ssl.scandit.com/terms/test.pdf\\n\\n > LICENSE && yarn licenses generate-disclaimer --production >> LICENSE && cat MANUAL_LICENSES >> LICENSE && yarn copy-special-docs
scripts.release: yarn reset && yarn clean && yarn license && yarn test && yarn docs:html && yarn copy-engine-sdk && yarn standard-version
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn unit && yarn check-coverage
scripts.unit: yarn build && yarn build:tests && nyc ava
scripts.watch: yarn build:main && yarn build:tests && yarn concurrently -r --kill-others "yarn build:main -w" "yarn build:tests -w" "sleepms 15000 && ava --watch"

scripts-info.clean: Remove build and test output folders
scripts-info.build-engine-sdk: Build the Scandit WebAssembly library in src/engine-sdk-wasm
scripts-info.build-engine-sdk-debug: Build the Scandit WebAssembly library in src/engine-sdk-wasm in debug mode
scripts-info.unit: (Remove and re)build the main library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, test and check coverage of the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild main library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.coverage: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.license: Generate LICENSE file with copyright and licenses of dependencies
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files, reset the repo to the last commit and install all needed packages
scripts-info.release: *Specify release type with --release-as major|minor|patch* - Clean, build, test, generate docs, generate license, and prepare release

scripts.postbump: echo 'Rebuilding project for updated version number' && yarn build
